channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Garden & Furniture Deals
channel.desc: Summer is well and truly here, so head outside and discover our brilliant selection of garden deals. From outdoor furniture to decor, these will help you live al fresco.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Laura Geller Make-up
channel.desc: Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Oisha Jewellery
channel.desc: Discover the world of Oisha - elegant jewellery that you'll treasure forever. Exquisitely crafted in India, each captivating piece will sit on your skin as a work of art in breath-taking detail.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Monsoon
channel.desc: Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: In the Salon with Gatineau
channel.desc: Professional beauty products from the pioneering skincare specialists. Gatineau combines the highest quality plant and marine extracts with the very latest cutting-edge biotechnology.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.
